metadata.name: Ordinal Ghibli #1
metadata.description: Ordinal Ghibli is a futuristic retelling of the beloved Studio Ghibli animated films. Set in a high-tech world filled with advanced robotics and artificial intelligence, this new version explores the same themes of love, friendship, and coming of age with a fresh perspective. With a stunning visual style that involves cutting-edge CGI, Ordinal Ghibli invites audiences to experience the magic of these classic stories in a whole new way. Get ready to be transported to a world of wonder, where the impossible becomes possible and the fantastical becomes real.
